text: Radboud University Nijmegen (Dutch: Radboud Universiteit Nijmegen), shortened to RU, is a public university (until 2020 Roman Catholic) in Nijmegen, a city in the province of Gelderland, the Netherlands. Radboud University Nijmegen was established in 1923. It has about 23,000 students. Its focus is on all sorts of sciences. == Other websites == * Category:Christian colleges and universities Category:Colleges and universities in the Netherlands Category:Roman Catholicism in the Netherlands Category:1920s establishments in the Netherlands Category:1923 establishments in Europe Category:Nijmegen
title: Radboud University Nijmegen
